channel.title: Fifa 15!
channel.description:
Yup, it's that time of year when the next Fifa is now available to pre-order. Who's buying, and opinions?
May be the same game, but it's fun to play. Really fun to play Ultimate Team!
Fifa 15 Trailer:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TnTYVT6lwBc

item.title: Fifa 15!
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

tyb97:

I always liked the FIFA games, I’m not a huge fan of soccer (American spelling get over it), but the games were always really great. The more recent Madden and NCAA Football games really screwed up the franchise/dynasty team-management modes, but FIFA managed to keep it fun and realistic, and FIFA Ultimate team is better than Madden’s, just has a better feel to it. Maybe since it has less players to keep up with it’s more fun, I don’t know.

Fifa has about 15-20k players thru all bronze - gold packs but ultimate team started on fifa in fifa 11 and football started it in 13 also fifa 15 also has the whole Ncaa football dev team helping so this years is flawless. Manager mode and player mode are so much better then last years and fifa 14 by far had the best. if you want to add me I’ll give you some players for UT Because last night I got my messi card

Read full topic

To each their own I suppose. I never really got into the whole sports game idea, but I think it’s pretty bad ass that Xbox One has the ability to support a full team of players on one console.

item.title: Fifa 15!
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

This year is so much different then the last few years were it was just minor changes… Ea access release it for trial (6 hours only) and iv been playing well over 6 hours already so idk if its a bug or not. Back on topic tho there’s so much changed from the Playing as player and making yourself a known player to UT.

Also if you guys have xbox one Ill help you out with some players I almost have my Spanish league team complete just need Messi so if your looking for other players ill sell for cheap because i dont need
